      private int extractUserIdFromMessage(String message)
      Helper method to extract user ID from message
      Parameters:
      message - the user's message
      Returns:
      int corresponding to success, -1 for fail, userID on success otherwise.

    • extractContentFromMessage

      private String extractContentFromMessage(String message)
      Helper method to extract content from message Implement based on your server's message format Example: "userID:123|content:Hello"
      Parameters:
      message - the message.
      Returns:
      extracted message parsed from server message format.

    • onWebSocketClose

      public void onWebSocketClose(int code, String reason, boolean remote)
      Handler for when the websocket closes.
      Specified by:
      onWebSocketClose in interface com.example.androidexample.WebSocketListener
      Parameters:
      code - The status code indicating the reason for closure.
      reason - A human-readable explanation for the closure.
      remote - Indicates whether the closure was initiated by the remote endpoint.
